ing: 2 tablespoons Greek seasoning (such as Cavender'sÂ®), or more to taste
1 (16 ounce) jar sliced pepperoncini peppers (such as MezzettaÂ®)
des:
"A co-worker shared this recipe with me. This is another one of my favorite slow cooker comfort foods. I don't know how I survived without this recipe in my life. I am glad I don't have to, and neither do you! 
I like to serve this on a hoagie or roll with chips and dip. Cook on High for 4 hours or on Low for 8."
ins:
Place pork tenderloin into a slow cooker, sprinkle meat generously with Greek seasoning, and pour the jar of peperoncini peppers with their juice over the pork. Cook 4 hours on High.
Shred the pork using 2 forks and allow to cook 10 to 15 more minutes.
